text: "I became this pawn caught between this intensifying war between the U.S. and China." On a new podcast, Jiayang Fan discusses how she became a target for anti-American sentiments in China. Listen here. https://t.co/T4KRgWBRPM

name: NewYorker
text: Faced with the prospect of losing power, the President has gone beyond mere scaremongering and resorted to fomenting unrest from the White House. https://t.co/ktAE7szEcO

text: To get at what had landed a demagogue in the White House, the novelist and playwright Ayad Akhtar had to take aim at himself. https://t.co/GDIXj2hdJd

name: NewYorker
text: Olivia Troye, the first staffer on the coronavirus task force to go public, told @sbg1 that America’s pandemic response was “derailed by the person at the very top.” https://t.co/RfGYgg7VDI
